text: The Anonymous Heroes or Wu ming ying xiong is a 1971 Hong Kong Shaw Brothers action-comedy film directed by Chang Cheh. ==Cast== *David Chiang *Ti Lung *Ching Li *Ku Feng as Brother Wan *Ching Miao *Yang Chih Ching *Wang Chung ==External links== * * The Anonymous Heroes at HKcinemamagic.com Category:1971 films Category:Hong Kong films Category:1970s action comedy films Category:Hong Kong action comedy films Category:Mandarin-language films Category:Shaw Brothers Studio films Category:Heroic bloodshed films Category:Films directed by Chang Cheh Category:1971 comedy films
title: The Anonymous Heroes
